faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, once duplicated to your workspace, you can freely modify all databases, views, and content to match your specific learning needs and preferences.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this template works perfectly with Notion's free plan and doesn't require any AI features to access the full learning experience.

faqs.answer: Very simple - just duplicate the template to your Notion workspace with one click. Detailed setup instructions are included to get you started immediately.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
